examples:

Refund request reason: I was not aware it would subscribe right away after my trial and I immediately cancelled it. Please refund me as I have not used the services and will not use them.

Refund request reason: I was not aware I had signed up for a free trial and did not want to subscribe. I would like a refund for this subscription charge and I have already cancelled the subscription.

currently I am unable to afford canva pro, I've cancelled the subscription as soon as I was charged, I wasn't aware of the date, otherwise would have done it before.
I request you to please refund me the amount. Will join pro in the future

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My subscription was automatically renewed although I was only made aware this month. Had I been informed that my subscription would be charged back in January, I could have cancelled it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We were not aware it would automatically renew. We don't use the service anymore and haven't since signing up last year.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

This is because on the website and in emails, it said that my subscription was ending, not that it would be automatically renewed.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I would like to be refunded for this subscription/cancel my subscription as I was not aware of the date it would be processed. Canva did not send any forewarning or indication that a payment would be due and I find that to be unprofessional and unhelpful to businesses like mine.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I set up an account to try canva for free. I was not aware that if I do not resign from the trial period, the contract will be extended for one year. Currently my company is closed, I will not use the services of your website and I am asking for the cancellation of the transaction and a refund.
Invoice number: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: My subscription has been renewed without my being aware of it. I unsubscribed in July and did not subscribe again behind.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, i am not using the canva pro and i am not aware for the subscription for this. Can I request a refund for this? Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had a free trial and wasn’t aware that it would renew automatically and I no longer need or use the extra options with Canva Pro

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wasn’t not aware that I had enrolled for a subscription for 119.00. This is the amount that was taken off of my debit card which has caused an overdraft. Please please please refund the payment, thanks.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello.  I received a message from my bank today saying that the payment of <NAME> to Canva failed to process due to expired card details.  I was not aware I was even subscribed to an annual plan so I went into my account to see and it seems that i signed up for a free trial and the amount mentioned above was to be charged today for renewal of the plan.   I had recently checked for any subscriptions on my apple account and since nothing appeared, I guessed I was not under a plan.  I would just like to clarify that I was not aware of the subscription renewal and cannot afford to pay that amount in any case. I have been using Canva for several years now and from time to time i buy some assets but I do not use it as much to be paying that amount annual.  Thank you in advance for you understanding.
